home.pmu_description: Micropigmentation and permanent makeup are pigmentation methods that incorporate natural pigments into the skin.
home.relaxing_massage_desc: Therapeutic massages are designed to alleviate chronic and acute movement and pain complaints.
home.reflexology_desc: Target pressure points on your feet to release blockages, improve energy flow & enhance overall health and well-being
home.hot_stone_desc: Experience deep relaxation with hot stones applied to pressure points, relieving tension & improving circulation for total wellness
home.facial_care_desc: Keeping your skin beautiful and youthful longer requires extra effort. A healthy lifestyle, diet, exercise, and using natural, healthy products.

home.booking_desc: Easily schedule your appointments online or by phone to suit you
home.commitment_desc: Under the guidance of our experienced team, we offer revitalizing spa treatments designed to enhance your natural beauty. With a focus on non-invasive therapies, our spa attracts clients from around the world seeking rejuvenation and relaxation.
home.deep_tissue_desc: Our deep tissue and therapeutic massages are designed to ease muscle tension, improve circulation, boost lymphatic flow, and restore a natural sense of calm and balance to your body.
home.faq_help: Not finding the answer you're looking for? Tell us what you need - we'll point you in the right direction.
home.faq_title: FAQs related to Zen Your Life Experience
home.partners_desc: The perfect organizer and developer for dream agency
home.faq_q1: What types of massages do you offer?
home.faq_a1: We offer a wide range of therapeutic massages including Swedish, deep tissue, hot stone, sports massage, reflexology, and specialty treatments like our signature Hopstempel massage using Belgian hops.
home.faq_q2: How long do the massage sessions last?
home.faq_a2: Our sessions range from 30 minutes to 90 minutes depending on the treatment type. Quick treatments like Back & Neck are 30 minutes, while full body massages typically last 60-90 minutes.
home.faq_q3: Do I need to book in advance?
home.faq_a3: Yes, we recommend booking in advance to ensure availability, especially for weekends and popular time slots. You can easily book online through our website or call us directly.
home.faq_q4: What should I expect during my first visit?
home.faq_a4: During your first visit, we'll discuss your health history, preferences, and any specific areas of concern. Our therapists will customize the treatment to your needs and ensure you're comfortable throughout the session.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Your Journey to Wellness
about.description: At Zen Your Life, we believe in the power of holistic wellness to transform lives.
about.hero_title: Wellness, Comfort and Mindful Living - All in One Place
about.hero_description: At Zenyouths, we believe that taking care of yourself shouldn't feel like a luxury you finally got around to — it should feel natural. So we set out to create a space where body, mind, and environment work together instead of fighting for your attention.
about.philosophy_p1: Most wellness brands promise instant transformation. We don't. What we offer is simpler — small, intentional experiences that leave a lasting impact.
about.philosophy_p2: Whether it's the warmth of a hot stone massage easing your tension or waking up in a rental home overlooking the volcanic landscape of Lanzarote, our goal is the same: help you reconnect with yourself in ways that genuinely matter.
about.philosophy_p3: Wellness isn't a trend. It's a practice. And we design everything around that truth.
about.personal_touch_desc: We don't do conveyor belt spa vibes — it's about caring.
about.honest_intentions_desc: No inflated marketing, no wellness jargon. It's holistic without drama.
about.authentic_quality_desc: Real, fair pricing for things that actually work.
about.holistic_perspective_desc: We see the bigger picture — it's how you feel, rest, and evolve.
about.therapeutic_massage_desc: Our massages aren't just about relaxation - they're designed to release built-up tension, relieves chronic muscle tension, improve flexibility, and align your nervous system to a multi-neutral base. From hot stone, deep tissue, to sports massage, every technique is chosen to help you reconnect with your body.
about.holiday_stays_desc: We've partnered with carefully selected accommodations in Lanzarote where it's beautiful, sustainable easy access for retreats. This ensures a space where you can exhale properly while staying in sync with surrounding nature's rhythms. Think rest, not just relaxing in pool.

pmu.title: Permanent Make-Up (PMU)
pmu.description: Micropigmentation and permanent makeup are pigmentation methods that incorporate natural pigments into the skin. Accentuate your natural beauty or camouflage minor imperfections.
pmu.section1_desc: Micropigmentation and permanent makeup are pigmentation methods that incorporate natural pigments into the skin. From eyebrows to eyeliner and lips, permanent makeup allows you to accentuate your natural beauty or camouflage minor imperfections. You can also make your lips appear naturally fuller.
pmu.section2_desc: It saves you a lot of time in the bathroom and allows you to enjoy a radiant look every day, even in the summer at the pool or beach. Wake up looking refreshed and ready without the daily hassle of applying makeup.
pmu.section3_desc: Permanent makeup is perfect if you suffer from allergies or sensitive, watery eyes, making it difficult to tolerate makeup. It is also suitable for people with alopecia, or if you have undergone chemotherapy, with the approval of your doctor.
pmu.benefit1_desc: Save precious time every morning with a makeup routine that's already done
pmu.benefit2_desc: Enhance your features while maintaining a natural, effortless look
pmu.benefit3_desc: Enjoy the pool, beach, or gym without worrying about your makeup
pmu.benefit4_desc: Results that last for years with proper care and maintenance
pmu.benefit5_desc: Feel confident and beautiful from the moment you wake up
pmu.target1_desc: Perfect for those who want to look polished without spending time on daily makeup
pmu.target2_desc: Ideal for those with sensitive or watery eyes who struggle with traditional makeup
pmu.target3_desc: Suitable for those with alopecia or recovering from chemotherapy (with doctor approval)
pmu.target4_desc: Great for athletes and fitness enthusiasts who want to look great during workouts

hero.description: Luxury villas in the stunning volcanic landscape of Lanzarote

overview.description_1: Lanzarote isn't just a destination — it's a rhythm. Volcanic cliffs, whitewashed villages, black-sand beaches, and quiet pockets of calm you won't find anywhere else. Our curated stays are designed to help you slip into that rhythm effortlessly.
overview.description_2: Whether you want ocean views, total seclusion, or a modern base close to Lanzarote's cultural spots, you'll find a place here that feels comfortably yours.
overview.villas_desc: Spacious, private, and perfect for families or long stays.
overview.countryside_desc: Slow living surrounded by volcanic landscapes.
overview.luxury_desc: High-end interiors, premium amenities, and total tranquility.

service.title: Experience Lanzarote
service.description: Discover the unique volcanic landscapes, pristine beaches, and year-round sunshine of this stunning Canary Island destination.

faq.still_questions_desc: Not finding the answer you're looking for? Tell us what you need - we'll point you in the right direction without the back-and-forth.
faq.a1: Each rental includes fully furnished accommodation with kitchen appliances, linens, towels, WiFi, and utilities. Some properties may also include parking and access to shared amenities.
faq.q2: How far are the rentals from Lanzarote's main attractions?
faq.a2: It depends on where you book. Coastal homes are minutes from beaches, while countryside stays sit close to volcanic trails and nature spots. Each listing includes an exact map and distance highlights so you know exactly what you're getting into.
faq.q3: Is early check-in or late check-out possible?
faq.a3: Early check-in and late check-out are subject to availability and may incur additional charges. Please contact us in advance to arrange special timing for your stay.
faq.q4: Are the rentals suitable for families or groups?
faq.a4: Yes! We offer a variety of properties that accommodate different group sizes, from cozy studios to spacious villas perfect for families and large groups.

footer.booking_title: Book your appointment for a rejuvenating experience
footer.about_description: Discover your perfect escape in Lanzarote. Our handpicked rental properties offer stunning views, modern amenities, and the authentic island experience you deserve.

property_overview.label: Overview
property_overview.title: Overview
property_overview.description1: A bright, airy villa overlooking the coastline, complete with private terrace, fully equipped kitchen, and minimalist interiors inspired by Lanzarote's volcanic landscape. Designed for slow mornings, relaxed evenings, and travelers who appreciate quiet comfort.
property_overview.description2: Perfect for couples, remote workers, small families, or anyone needing a break from noise.
property_overview.highlight1: Private terrace with panoramic ocean views
property_overview.highlight2: Open-plan living room with natural light
property_overview.highlight3: Fully equipped kitchen (coffee maker included — priorities, right?)
property_overview.highlight4: High-speed Wi-Fi for work or streaming
property_overview.highlight5: Airy bedroom with queen bed & quality linens
property_overview.highlight7: Short drive to restaurants, cafes, and cultural spots
property_overview.highlight8: Quiet residential area — zero resort chaos
